cornerstone@gold.desc[1]:
There is a cornerstone one the edge of the church.  It looks as if it may 
be loose.
cornerstone@gold.name: cornerstone
cornerstone@gold.examine:
It is a normal conerstone. What did you expect? A secret 
message??   Geez!
cornerstone@gold.desc[0]:
There is a cornerstone here that has been rotated on it's axis.  
The inscription on it reads:
                            +-------------------+
                            | Built in the name |
                            |  of King Arthur   |
                            |       1650        |
                            +-------------------+

pinhole_b@gold.desc[1]: There is a pinhole in the ceiling.
pinhole_b@gold.name: pinhole_b
pinhole_b@gold.desc[0]:
There is a hole in the ceiling above you and a pile of dirt on the floor.  
The hole is not accessible to you.

door_sanctuary@gold.desc[1]:
You can see the faint outline of a doorway in the floor here.
However, you can figure no way to open it!
door_sanctuary@gold.name: door_sanctuary
door_sanctuary@gold.examine: You can't figure out the trapdoor opens!
door_sanctuary@gold.desc[0]: There is an open passageway leading down here.

door_passage@gold.name: door_passage
door_passage@gold.examine: An entrance into this dark, cold passageway lies above you.

gold_gates_outside@gold.name: gold_gates_outside
gold_gates_outside@gold.examine:
There is a Ribbon tied to one pillar of the gates, the other is 
void of decorations.

machine@gold.name: machine
machine@gold.examine:
There is a light on the side of this machine, and it is blinking green.  
You see a sign on the nearest end which reads 'INPUT' and a sign on the far 
end which reads 'OUTPUT'. Hmmmm....you wonder what to PUT INTO the machine!!  
There is a small sign on the side of the machine near the light which reads:
           _____________________________________________
          |         Eastern Alchemy Corporation         |
          |             1654 Sir Robin Lane             |
          |           Castle Camelot, England           |
          |                                             |
          |                 **WARNING**                 |
          |        Be Cautious and ensure you are       |
          |        properly protected and trained       |
          |           while using this machine          |
          |_____________________________________________|
machine@gold.desc[0]:
There is a machine here which takes up most of the space 
in this basement.

ribbon@gold.name: ribbon
ribbon@gold.examine: What? Ya think I lie? It's yellow I said!

treasure@gold.desc[1]: A large and valuable treasure is gathering dust in a dark corner.
treasure@gold.name: treasure
treasure@gold.examine: It consists entirely of gold items shaped as small knights!
treasure@gold.desc[0]: A large and valuable treasure has been stacked here!

jacket@gold.name: jacket
jacket@gold.examine:
It has a very tight weave to it, perhaps designed to 
reject blows from a weapon.
jacket@gold.desc[0]:
There is a heavy jacket laying here on the ground, lost 
by a previously unsuccessful explorer.

bundle@gold.desc[1]: There is a ruined bundle of hay laying here, tied with a yellow ribbon.
bundle@gold.name: bundle
bundle@gold.examine:
This hay has been rejected by it's pickers because it has 
lost its golden shine.
bundle@gold.desc[0]: The ribbon tying the hay together has been removed, and the hay is scattered.

gold_gates_inside@gold.name: gold_gates_inside
gold_gates_inside@gold.desc[0]: The gate stands open to the west.

shrubbery@gold.name: shrubbery
shrubbery@gold.examine:
This shrubbery can be picked up.  It is loose in the roots 
and seems to be dying.
shrubbery@gold.desc[0]: There is a shrubbery growing here.

huge_doors_inside@gold.desc[1]: The huge oak doors are closed.
huge_doors_inside@gold.name: huge_doors_inside
huge_doors_inside@gold.desc[2]: The huge oak doors are locked.
huge_doors_inside@gold.desc[0]: The huge oak doors are open.

ingot@gold.name: ingot
ingot@gold.examine: This is a solid gold ingot! And it's HEAVY!
ingot@gold.desc[0]: There is a brilliant gold ingot here!

switch@gold.desc[1]: There is a switch on the wall here in the ON position.
switch@gold.name: switch
switch@gold.examine: It is a normal Light switch!
switch@gold.desc[0]: There is a switch on the wall here in the OFF position.

bones@gold.name: bones
bones@gold.examine: It is the remains of some unfortunate adventurer.

mask@gold.name: mask
mask@gold.examine:
It has a very thick shield and blinder on it. It doesn't 
look as though you could even see through the shield!
mask@gold.desc[0]: There is a welder's mask laying here.

pinhole_a@gold.desc[1]: There is a pinhole in the floor.
pinhole_a@gold.name: pinhole_a
pinhole_a@gold.examine: You can see a glimmer of light through the hole.
pinhole_a@gold.desc[0]: A hole has been widened in the floor!

huge_doors_outside@gold.desc[1]: The huge oak doors are closed.
huge_doors_outside@gold.name: huge_doors_outside
huge_doors_outside@gold.desc[2]: The huge oak doors are locked.
huge_doors_outside@gold.desc[0]: The huge oak doors are open.

scythe@gold.name: scythe
scythe@gold.examine:
It is a scythe used for cutting patches of hay. This one 
looks well used, however, and has a tint of gold to it.
scythe@gold.desc[0]: There is a sharp scythe here!

sanctuary@gold.title: Sanctuary
sanctuary@gold.description:
As you enter the Sanctuary, you stand in absolute amazement at the sights 
laid out before you.  There are rows upon rows of pews, on your left and 
right.  As you look up, there appears to be no top to the cathedral, and it 
is open to the skies above you.  You can feel the weather from outside, 
however, it does not affect the health of the sanctuary.  There is a stairway 
to the left of the room which appears to lead to the altar.

entryway@gold.title: Entryway
entryway@gold.description:
What a beautiful work of art.  There's a large archway leading into the 
center aisle of an incredible sanctuary. You wonder how anyone could have 
built this place. All walls, doors and floors are trimmed in pure gold, and 
it peaks your interest as to where the gold came from!

passage2@gold.title: Passage Out!
passage2@gold.description:
You are in a North <-> South passageway which runs underground.  There are 
three pictures on the wall in this room.  The first is of a man with the word 
NED inscribed on his coat of arms.  The second depicts NED feeding a needy 
person who is lying on the ground.  The third shows NED battling a mighty 
warrior with a strong weapon and defense.  It looks as if there may be a 
chalice of some sort in the background of the painting, though the paint has 
faded somewhat, and it is hard to tell.

altar@gold.title: Altar
altar@gold.description:
You are standing at the altar facing the pews of the church.  You notice 
that the number of pews as perceived from here is much less than you thought 
as you walked through them.

gold2@gold.title: I wouldn't do that!!
gold2@gold.description:
But YOU did!  This is a death trap that has been converted by someone as a 
hideaway for precious items.  I guess they figured no one would be stupid 
enough to come in here with the name he gave it!!

basement@gold.title: Basement
basement@gold.description:
This is a bright and lovely basement. In fact, this is the cleanest 
basement you have ever seen!  There is a large machine taking up most of the 
room in this basement.

pathtochurch@gold.title: Path to Church
pathtochurch@gold.description:
In the distance, you can make out the outline of a steeple standing amidst 
a carefully groomed lines of trees.  This path continues East and West.

gold3@gold.title: Rolling Fields
gold3@gold.description:
These fields are the result of the work of many little people, each of 
which sneers at you as you enter.  They seem to be working very hard.  You 
notice while glancing around that these people are half your height!!!

gold1b@gold.title: On The Path
gold1b@gold.description:
You are following a small path that is leading you along golden coloured
fields of grass and wheat.
To the west you see the path dissapear between two large boulders, and a huge
mound rises above them.

passage4@gold.title: Finally! The Exit!
passage4@gold.description:
You have finally reached it! However, you see NO EXITS!!  There are piles 
of bones here too, so your outlook doesn't look too good!

churchpath@gold.title: Church Path
churchpath@gold.description:
You are travelling along a well groomed line of trees. The steeple you saw 
before is now closer to you, and appears to be more beautiful the closer you 
get to it.

passage1@gold.title: Passage Out!
passage1@gold.description:
You are in a North <-> South passageway which runs underground.  You see 
a picture on the wall of a man near water blowing into a mighty horn, and a 
hand reaching out of the water with a gleaming sword grasped firmly.  Could 
this be the way to the famed sword Excalibur!?

passage3@gold.title: Passage Out?
passage3@gold.description:
You are in another passageway under the ground which travels North and 
South. The drawings on the walls here are of a large table which has been 
squared off to be The Square Table, as the drawing is titled. It has names 
like Lancelot, Graham and Robin inscribed on it in an order of seating. What 
looks like the Holy Grail is standing in the center of the table, surrounded 
by never fading flowers! At one end of the table must be King Arthur's seat, 
for painted there is a majestic crown and the sword of glory, Excalibur. You 
suddenly realise that the knights of the square table are no more!

gold1a@gold.title: Below The North Barrow
gold1a@gold.description:
A small path is winding its way down from the top of the large mound.
It leads eastward between two large boulders, and you can see some rolling
fields with yellow, almost golden, crops in the far distance.

goldgates@gold.title: Gold Gates
goldgates@gold.description:
There is a pair of golden gates here.  You see no possible way to open 
them, and it is frustrating you because you realize there is no other way 
out.  There is a large bright exit to the south, and a dark hole that it 
looks like you could *just* squeeze through to the north.

churchsteps@gold.title: Golden Church Steps
churchsteps@gold.description:
There are two massive doors here.  You find it hard to believe that this 
church is built by people!  The doors alone are at least 100 feet in height 
and the church itself towers far above you.  There is a large cornerstone on 
the church.  You notice it has some kind of lettering on it.  The doors are 
huge oak doors.

goldpriest@gold.name: GoldPriest
goldpriest@gold.examine: This Priest looks like he couldn't hurt a fly.
goldpriest@gold.description:
There is a peaceful golden-skinned Priest here with an 
offering plate in his hands.  He asks 'Will you help us with a donation?'

robin@gold.name: Robin
robin@gold.examine: Robin is just a harmless idiot knight.
robin@gold.description: Sir Robin, the knight of the Square Table is here.  He looks like an Idiot!

graham@gold.name: Graham
graham@gold.description:
Sir Graham, the Knight of the Square Table is here.
It does not look as if you can pass him!

lancelot@gold.name: Lancelot
lancelot@gold.examine:
Lancelot looks as if he COULD tear you limb from limb! 
I wouldn't mess with him if I were you.
lancelot@gold.description: Sir Lancelot is waiting here to rip you apart!
